titles.title: Accuracy and Uniformity in Dropout Rate Reporting Study Act

To direct the Secretary of Education to conduct a study to determine the best means of developing a national standard by which to measure the rate at which students drop out of secondary schools in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/1/2001--Introduced. Accuracy and Uniformity in Dropout Rate Reporting Study Act - Directs the Secretary of Education to study and report to Congress on the best means of developing a national standard by which to measure the rate at which students drop out of secondary schools in the United States.
